attributes.contentHtml:
rhys Im not trying to start some drama or anything.. But claiming to be a pro coder and then is not, is not something you should say here.. In fact, you should've ignored it.. Many people also claims to be pro coders, then it turns out they're not.. And the most of the people they say it to completely ignores it.

2nd, faking a girlfriend, some people do that, and i think they should have the rights to do that if they want to.. Again i see nothing wrong with it..

I am not trying to defend Fexor/Vortyx/Decrypt0r, I am just saying that these claims I mentioned should probably get removed as they're irrelevent to this thread.

attributes.title: Fexor/Vortyx/Decrypt0r || Racist, DDOS Threats & Threatening people

attributes.contentHtml:
Oliver1234dotdot Faking girlfriends is just weird, and tbh i can't believe you think it's ok.

Also the pro coder thing he thought he was a pro coder not us.
